## Ingredients

1 lb chicken breast (diced into small cubes)

chicken bullion cube

coconut milk

egg noodles/spaghetti

besan (gram flour)

lemon

chilli chips (my fav)

scallions (green onions)

onion

tomato

cooking oil

ginger, garlic, chilli paste (or individually)

chaat masala

coriander powder

cumin powder

salt

laal masala
